edu.cmu.sei.arche.corebridge.listener
Class CoreListener

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.sei.arche.corebridge.listener.CoreListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, jess.JessListener
public class CoreListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements jess.JessListener

The CoreListener implements the JessListener interface and allows the Core Bridge to receive notifications of events of interest in the ArchE Core.

Author:
Neel Mullick

Constructor Detail

CoreListener

public CoreListener(IRefreshableUI ui,
                    ProjectVO project,
                    java.util.List designElementTypes,
                    java.util.List designRelationTypes)
Parameters:
ui - represents the UI layer that is currently displaying the data of the factbase that this object is listening to. The reference to the UI is needed further ahead by the VO objects so that they know what UI to call to flag views to refresh.
project - The ProjectVO object is the entry point to access all the facts in memory. VOUpdate will later on need this reference so that when a new fact is assertedasserted/modified/retracted, we can add/change/remove the corresponding VO to this project.
designElementTypes - List of design element type definitions
designRelationTypes - List of design relation type definitions

                   throws jess.JessException
Receives event notification from the ArchE Core.

Parameters:
jEvent - The JessEvent that occured in the ArchE Core.
